mapper.sql: uid, loginname, passwd, name, create_time, update_time, address, description
mapper.select:
select
from mama_users where name like concat('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into mama_users (uid, loginname, passwd, name, create_time, update_time, address, description) values (#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into mama_users
uid,
loginname,
passwd,
name,
create_time,
update_time,
address,
description,
#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update mama_users
loginname = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update mama_users set loginname = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
